title: $:/plugins/sk/ColorText
author: Stephen Kimmel
name: ColorText
description: Color Text and Highlight 添加文字颜色、马克笔高亮文本
readme:
<$button class="tc-btn-invisible" style="overflow: hidden;white-space: pre;width: 100%;" message="tm-open-external-window" param="http://skplugins.tiddlyspot.com/index.html">{{$:/core/images/home-button}} <$text text="http://skplugins.tiddlyspot.com/index.html"/></$button>

Adds text color or background highlighting to a specified block of text, as editor toolbar buttons. 添加三个编辑器工具栏按钮，可以选择颜色，一键添加文字颜色、添加背景色（马克笔）。
